data.title: 2024 Best Texas Counties to Live In
data.meta_description: Ranking of best counties in Texas based on crime, public schools, cost of living, job opportunities, and local amenities.
data.text:
#1 Best Counties to Live in Texas .

Collin County

County in Texas ,

60 Niche users give it an average review of 4.3 stars.

Featured Review: Current Resident says As a college student, Collin County is a very nice place to live. Travel times are decent, but they are way different from living in rural areas. There are plenty of places to eat. There are trails... .

Read 60 reviews.

Overall Niche Grade : A+ ,

Population : 1,079,153 ,

Fort Bend County

County in Texas ,

37 Niche users give it an average review of 4.1 stars.

Featured Review: Current Resident says The Fort Bend County is an extremely diverse and inclusive community that values every aspect within it. I have been living in the County for all of my life and have always felt comforted to be... .

Read 37 reviews.

Overall Niche Grade : A+ ,

Population : 832,607 ,

Denton County

County in Texas ,

120 Niche users give it an average review of 4.3 stars.

Featured Review: Current Resident says As a whole, Denton County is a vibrant community that offers a high quality of life. There is a blend of educational excellence, economic opportunities, richness of culture, and recreational... .

Overall Niche Grade : A+ ,

Population : 914,870 ,

#4 Best Counties to Live in Texas .

Rockwall County

County in Texas ,

74 Niche users give it an average review of 4.4 stars.

Featured Review: Current Resident says Rockwall has been a great community for the past two years I've lived here. I enjoy the people and the small businesses, especially at the square. .

Overall Niche Grade : A+ ,

Population : 110,631 ,

#5 Best Counties to Live in Texas .

Travis County

County in Texas ,

71 Niche users give it an average review of 3.7 stars.

Featured Review: Current Resident says Travis county is an area with fantastic public schools! Housing prices are high, but most public spaces are kept clean with a variety of parks and libraries. .

Read 71 reviews.

Overall Niche Grade : A+ ,

Population : 1,289,054 ,

#6 Best Counties to Live in Texas .

Williamson County

County in Texas ,

6 Niche users give it an average review of 4.7 stars.

Featured Review: Current Resident says Williamson County is a great place to live. Everyone is friendly and nice. There is a lot of great places to explore like foods, shopping, movie theaters, adventure parks, Baseball parks, parks,... Williamson county prices for housing, rent, food, and other things have been increasing. I do wish that it offers more fun events to celebrate creativity or other things. .

Overall Niche Grade : A+ ,

Population : 617,396 ,

Featured Review: Current Resident says This is a great place to raise kids because of the many different educational paths that can be taken for each child. There tends to be crime in the downtown area of Lubbock, but it is fairly safe in... .

County in Texas ,

Featured Review: Niche User says Brewster County has very friendly people. The land prices are good without a bunch of restrictions on building. It has great parks with great scenery and lots of wildlife. It is a great place! .

County in Texas ,
